name: citadels-js-client
description: An implementation of the Citadels card game, client part using JavaScript
browserslist: last 3 version, > 0.5%, not dead, not ie <= 11

scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev GAME_NAME=citadels WP_CONFIG=all webpack --config webpack.config.js
scripts.prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=prod GAME_NAME=citadels WP_CONFIG=all webpack --config webpack.config.js
scripts.analyse: cross-env NODE_ENV=analyse GAME_NAME=citadels WP_CONFIG=all webpack --config webpack.config.js

author: Lucas Poulain (ShallowRed)
